title: AI X Draft Reply
shortDesc: Turn rough ideas into sharp replies in seconds.
desc: Write smarter, faster, and in the right tone — every time.
longDesc: AI X Draft Reply takes the selected tweet and gives you ideas and inspiration to reply to it.

marketing.headline: Your AI Co-Pilot for X
marketing.subHeadline: Write smarter, faster, and in the right tone — every time.
marketing.subText: Stop second-guessing your tweets and replies. Our Chrome extension helps you craft posts that fit the moment, whether you need to be witty, professional, empathetic, or bold.

howItWorks.title: Choose Your Tone
howItWorks.text: From friendly to formal, sarcastic to supportive — pick from multiple tones that match your voice (or let AI suggest one).

howItWorks.title: Analyze Before You Reply
howItWorks.text: Drop a reply draft, and the extension will analyze it instantly: Is it too harsh? Too casual? Missing clarity? It gives you feedback and suggests an improved version in the tone you want.

howItWorks.title: One-Click Magic
howItWorks.text: Highlight, tweak, and send — without leaving X. The extension lives right inside the reply box, like a true co-pilot.

whyUseIt: Save time — no more rewriting replies.
Stay on-brand — always hit the right tone.
Boost engagement — craft posts that resonate.

demoSteps.title: Install the Extension
details: Once installed, the extension icon appears in the Chrome toolbar.

demoSteps.title: Open X (Twitter)
details: The extension integrates directly into the reply box.

demoSteps.title: Select a Tone
details: The user clicks the extension icon or uses the shortcut (Ctrl+R).
A menu appears with multiple tones (e.g. Professional, Friendly, Sarcastic, Empathetic).

demoSteps.title: Analyze a Draft Reply
details: When a user types a reply, the extension analyzes it for tone, clarity, and sentiment.
It identifies issues like: too harsh, too casual, not clear.

demoSteps.title: Get AI Suggestions
details: Based on the chosen tone, the extension suggests rewritten replies.

Example:
Original reply: “This makes no sense.”
Professional tone: “Could you clarify what you mean?”
Friendly tone: “I’m not sure I follow, can you explain?”

demoSteps.title: One-Click Insert
details: The user selects the improved version.
With one click, it replaces their reply inside X’s reply box.
